about_the_game:
Earth: the year 3000…
EARTH:3000 is a survival RPG made with the Unreal 5 engine, set in a post-technological dark age.

Centuries have passed since the apocalypse. History is mostly forgotten, but relics of past eras remain. Swords and muskets exist alongside mutants and cyborgs.

Create a custom character and explore the mysteries and dangers of the wasteland! Will you search the ancient ruins for knowledge, or loot them for treasure? Fight other players and steal their items, or work together to build a new civilization? Rule over a city, or journey to distant lands - and maybe even find a way off of this doomed world?

Planned features (subject to change prior to release)
  • Survive in a future dark age wasteland
  • Fast-paced, full-loot PVP
  • Control towns and hire NPC guards
  • Loot ancient ruins for rare artifacts
  • Mix of mostly low-tech melee and ranged weapons
  • Play as a mutant, cyborg or techno-mage (very rare)
  • Defend against bandits... or become one
  • Fly across the deserts in a sandship or airship
  • Form caravans to trade resources
  • (or rob merchants and steal their goods!)
  • Fight for territory against rival factions
  • Journey to the toxic oceans and acid rainforests
  • Discover clues to the earth's lost secrets
  • Travel to SPACE
  • ...and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A post-apocalyptic survival RPG set on a desolate future earth, with unrestricted PVP, player-controlled towns and factions.
